name: Import CSV data into Invoice Ninja
description: This template helps you import a list of customers automatically into Invoice Ninja via CSV import. The scenario can be scheduled to run at regular intervals: every minute, hour, day or at the specified date. The template uses [this example CSV file](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1G0ne7M9bYqjGh5WjYh6oTsram_f6BpO0/view?usp=sharing).
